item.title: Compiler with source
item.dc:creator: @runyluny runyluny
item.description:
@runyluny wrote:

can someone explain to me why my compile doesnt work with my source but works for my client? this is in the notepad when i edit the source compiler…

@echo off
title Compile
cd Source
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_22\Bin\javac.exe” -cp . -d ./Bin/ ./*java
pause

I already switched the Java, thats where its located exactly. my compiler works for client but not for source.

Read full topic
